vecHighlight.strDescription: Distribute 1000kg of Oxygen using gas vents.
Have at least 20 living Duplicants living in the colony at one time.
Reach cycle 100 with at least one living Duplicant.
Construct a building outside the initial starting biome.
Use a Duplicant's Skill Points to buy out an entire branch of the Skill Tree.
Have a Duplicant eat any cooked meal prepared at an Electrical Grill or Gas Range.
Have at least one bed and one toilet for each Duplicant in the colony.
Hatch a new critter morph from an egg.

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Replace all the Outhouses and Wash Basins in your colony with Lavatories and Sinks.
Cure a sick Duplicant of disease.
Automate a building using sensors or switches from the Automation tab in the Build Menu.
Recover a Database entry by inspecting facility ruins.
Enter an oil biome for the first time.
Have a Duplicant with the Masterworks skill paint a Masterpiece quality painting.
Have 8 Duplicants wear non-default clothing simultaneously.
Reach cycle 365.25 with a single colony.
Have Duplicants travel 10,000m by Transit Tube.
Reveal 80% of map by exploring outside the starting biome.
Perform 100 Tune Ups on power generators.
Launch your first rocket into space.

data.strFullDescription:
In the space-colony simulation game [i]Oxygen Not Included[/i] you’ll find that scarcities of oxygen, warmth and sustenance are constant threats to your colony's survival. Guide colonists through the perils of subterranean asteroid living and watch as their population grows until they're not simply surviving, but [i]thriving... [/i]

[b]Just make sure you don't forget to breathe.[/b]

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_01_BuildExtensiveBases.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Build Extensive Bases and Discover What it Takes to Survive:[/h2]
Everything in your space colony is under your control, from excavation and resource allocation right down to plumbing and power systems. Resources will begin depleting with your first breath, however, so be sure to dig fast if you want to live.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_02_ItsMindOverMatter.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
It’s Mind Over Matter with Stress Simulations:[/h2]
Keep the psychological impact of survival at bay with fun leisure activities, great accommodations and even better food for your colony. Duplicants each have different and potentially destructive ways of reacting to stress, so be sure to always keep them happy. Whatever the cost.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_03_AvoidBoilingWithThermoDynamics.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Avoid Boiling with Thermodynamics:[/h2]
Temperature control is a constant concern in space; too cold and you'll freeze, too hot and you'll fry. Keep tabs on ambient environmental temperatures and your colony's heat production to maintain a nice, cozy atmosphere for your colonists.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_04_EnhanceEfficiencyThroughGas.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Enhance Efficiency through Complex Gas and Liquid Simulations:[/h2]
Create interlocking pipe systems to swiftly deliver fuel and liquid to critical areas of your base. Plan well and be rewarded as your colony transforms into an imperishable, well-oiled machine.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_05_TakeChargeWithpowerGrid.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Take Charge with Power Grid Simulations:[/h2]
Choose from a multitude of power sources including coal, hydrogen, natural gas or just plain old elbow grease. Manage power runoff, circuit overloads and meltdowns to keep your colony running smoothly.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_06_AlwaysKeepYourselfBreathing.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Always Keep Yourself Breathing:[/h2]
Enter the Oxygen Overlay and watch air moving through your base in real time. Monitor carbon dioxide accumulation and oversee oxygen generation processes to mold your colony into a veritable deep-space oasis.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_07_WasteNothing.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Waste Nothing through Extreme Recycling:[/h2]
Make use of every last resource for a base that truly exemplifies efficiency. Recycle waste into precious fuel, process unbreathable gas into air or harness the natural bodily processes of wild creatures for food. If you’re clever, you might even be able to run a base off colonist farts.

[h2][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/ONI_GIF_08_ExploreDiverseProceduralWorlds.gif?t=1741894890[/img]
Explore Diverse, Procedurally Generated New Worlds:[/h2]
Summon new worlds with a push of a button. Experience tons of untamed space rocks, then suffocate to death in them!
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/457140/extras/HeadingDivider.png?t=1741894890[/img]
data.strSnippet: Oxygen Not Included is a space-colony simulation game. Deep inside an alien space rock your industrious crew will need to master science, overcome strange new lifeforms, and harness incredible space tech to survive, and possibly, thrive.
